title: Automation Aftermarket Services and Outsourcing Market in A
text:
NEW YORK , Oct.   Industrial automation refers to automating a plant's facilities and machineries using control and monitoring products such as drives, actuators, PLC, SCADA, and DCS. In plants, automation helps reduce human intervention in repeated operations, increase process efficiency, and aid in effective monitoring and control. Industries such as automotive, oil and gas, power, chemical, and food and beverage are the major end-users of automation solutions to increase their productivity and efficiency. End-users either introduce automation solutions and get aftermarket support from a single source vendor or go for outsourcing for all their automation needs based on their requirements and budgetary allocations. The outsourcing activity involves all the operations from consulting services to spare parts management. 

Technavio's analysts forecast the automation aftermarket services and outsourcing market in APAC to grow at a CAGR of 12.18% over the period 2014-2019.

Covered in this report 
This report covers the present scenario and the growth prospects of the automation aftermarket services and outsourcing market in APAC for the period 2015-2019. To calculate the market size, the report considers revenue generated from the different service types. The report also presents the vendor landscape and a corresponding detailed analysis of the top four vendors in the market. In addition, the report discusses the major drivers that influence the growth of the market. It also outlines the challenges faced by vendors and the market at large, as well as the key trends that are emerging in the market
